CustomField.description:
The note appears in a rectangle in the template header. The text is centered. It is possible to insert a string
into the text to jump to a new line. The height and width of the text is limited. Checks the appearance of the pdf when changing the parameter.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
The note appears in a rectangle in the template header. The text is centered. It is possible to insert a string
into the text to jump to a new line. The height and width of the text is limited. Checks the appearance of the pdf when changing the parameter
CustomField.label: Template Header Note
